name: Christmas Bubble Shooter
storyline:
Christmas is coming! And Santa is preparing his sleigh. Snowmen are responsible for packing presents.
Everything is almost ready... But where are the snowmen?? Oh no!! They are trapped inside colorful bubbles. And now Santa needs your help to pop all the bubbles and find the snowmen... So are you ready to take dive into an amazing adventure to save them and take a chance of being a hero once again?
summary: Love Christmas games? Then get ready to rescue snowmen trapped inside the bubbles and return them safely to Santa. Adjust your winning strategies in each game! The more bubbles you remove in one shot, the more points you score, and the closer you get to be the master of Christmas Bubbles. By blasting, popping and matching your way through over 100 levels you'll free the snowmen in this bubble shooter game.
